6.4. Life Cycle of a Bug

The life cycle, also known as work flow, of a bug is currently hardcoded into Bugzilla. Figure 6-1 contains a graphical repsentation of this life cycle. If you wish to customize this image for your site, the diagram file is available in Dia's native XML format.
